Score2022METHODOLOGY
The employee engagement survey is conducted using the following steps: 
1. design the survey items to solicit anonymous feedback on a variety of relevant engagement topics, with many questions remaining   
 the same from year to year to measure trends over time; 
2. administer the global survey to all employees; 
3. analyze the qualitative and quantitative results and synthesize the key themes; 
4. communicate the survey results with employees; 
5. develop team action plans to address areas of opportunities identified by employees. We monitor employee engagement    
 continuously between the annual full-length engagement surveys with a listening strategy that includes follow up pulse surveys.
